artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
description: landscape with figures on a road in foreground, including two pairs of figures carrying boxes on poles; tall, rounded hill at right; calm water at left with boats; flying birds and full moon, ULQ; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Takanawa
